usefulItems: freezer proof container, long sharp knife, freezer
title: Rich Lemon Ice Cream

preparations.content: Place lemon zest, condensed milk, cream, limoncello and lemon juice in mixing bowl then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>.
Transfer to a freezer proof container and freeze overnight or for at least 10 hours.

Remove from freezer, tip out and cut into 3 cm x 3 cm squares. Place half the frozen squares in mixing bowl and churn <b>10 sec/speed 2<b>. Tip out and set aside then place remaining frozen squares in mixing bowl and churn <b>10 sec/speed 2<b>.
Return churned mixture to freezer proof container and freeze for at least 4 hours. When ready, serve ice cream straight from freezer.

hintsAndTricks: This is a delicious soft scoop ice cream that is very luscious and creamy. Enjoy with fresh berries on a summer's day.
